survey_name: University Student IT Services Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess student satisfaction with university-provided IT services, including Wi-Fi, online learning platforms, and tech support.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of the university's Wi-Fi service?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use single-choice radio buttons for responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of the university's Wi-Fi service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following IT services have you used in the past semester? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options as they may have used more than one service.

script.question_text: Which of the following IT services have you used in the past semester? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's IT services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the university's IT services?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues when using the online learning platform?
questions.routing_logic: Show if 'Online learning platform' is selected in Q2.
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify frequency of technical issues among users of the online learning platform.
questions.scripter_notes: Use single-choice radio buttons for responses.

script.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues when using the online learning platform?
script.routing_logic: Show if 'Online learning platform' is selected in Q2.

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the responsiveness of the university's tech support team? (1 = Very poor, 5 = Excellent)
questions.routing_logic: Show if 'Tech support services' is selected in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point numerical scale to measure perceived responsiveness of tech support.
questions.scripter_notes: Use single-choice radio buttons for responses.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the responsiveness of the university's tech support team? (1 = Very poor, 5 = Excellent)
script.routing_logic: Show if 'Tech support services' is selected in Q2.
